The goal of PanCanNebraska package is to iddentify potential drugs that can be used to
mimic or reverse the signatures of PAF1 or PRPK1.

## Installation

You can install the released version of PanCanNebraska from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("PanCanNebraska")
```
